summary: Replaces the obnoxious Nighteye sound with either silence or a much quieter version.
descriptionHtml:
[size=25][color=red]Please note that I highly recommend you use [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/16615/?]Night Eye Overhaul by BigFuzzyBear[/url] instead of this mod as it has this functionally plus a whole lot more. However, the mod will remain up for those who wish to use it.

So, with that out of the way...[/color][/size]

Once upon a time, in the cold land of Skyrim, a young Khajiit found himself next in line for a viking crewcut. He escaped, only to be driven mad by his eyeballs screaming at him every night.

This mod replaces the loud and obnoxious WOOOOOSH noise that I am sure all cats hear when they go outside at night to utter silence. For those who want the noise, but just quieter, there is a version for them too.

If you want to tweak the volume level yourself, use any BSA explorer (I use FoMM myself) to extract "soundfxmagillusionmag_illusion_nighteye_off.wav" and "soundfxmagillusionmag_illusion_nighteye_on.wav" from "Skyrim - Sounds.bsa"

[b][u]Installation Instructions[/u][/b]
Click the Downloads Button and then pick the version you want!
If you download it manually, simply extract it to the Data folder of Skyrim (i.e. the two sound files should be in "C:Program FilesSteamsteamappscommonskyrimDataSoundfxmagillusion" or similar).

[u][b]Credits:[/b][/u]
[b]Bethesda[/b] - For making the best open world games ever made (and the original sound file).
[b]FoMM[/b] - For making a easy to use BSA explorer so I could get said file.
[b]Audacity[/b] - For being an awesome Free audio editor.
[b]Mountain Dew[/b] - For being so tasty.


[b][u]Credits:[/b][/u]
[b]Bethesda - [/b]For making the best open world games ever made.
[b]Mountain Dew - [/b]For being so tasty.
